name: Void Meteorid
description:
is a game where you are a Rhombus that avoids being hit by a rain of hexagons, will you manage to survive?

The constant falling of hexagons also drops one of the most powerful objects that will help you to survive in this agnostic world.

This is my first game I know it is not very good but if I see that it has a lot of support I will improve it over time :D
